title: Community Engagement Toolkit – User-Generated Event Submissions
summary: As a developer, I want to enable users to submit community events directly through the ALFRED platform, so that elderly users can discover and participate in relevant social activities that enhance their well-being and social connections.

title: Voice-Activated Video Call Scheduling
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate a voice-activated video call scheduling feature into the ALFRED platform so that elderly users can effortlessly connect with their caregivers and family, enhancing their social inclusion.
